sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { vrInfo } from 'src/vrInfo'; @Component({ selector: 'app-vr-custom', templateUrl: './vr-custom.component.html', styleUrls: ['./vr-custom.component.css'] }) export class VrCustomComponent { headset: vrInfo = { id: 1, ipAdress: '10.0.0.1', port: "8001", name: 'VR1', isOnline: true }; imagePathQuest3: string = 'assets/images/metaquest3.png'; }
  • Name:
    IpAddress:
    Port:
    Status: {{ headset.isOnline }}
